üìú Manifesto

I am a professional Mechanical Engineer and Software Developer by passion. I love to master coding challenges from front-end to back-end.

I want to enable myself for a career in software development or web design. My primary goal now is to gather as much practical coding experience as possible and to fill my portfolio with my first projects.

Born and raised in Berlin. During my last years in highschool my interest in astronomics, coding and physics awakened. After graduating, I studied Mechanical Engineering with a focus on design, life science and manufacturing. Parallely, my interest in coding and software began to grow and I decided to pursue this passion in my free time to supplement my engineering expertise. Now I strife to lift my coding skills to the next level.
